summary: Build a job application app that matches job descriptions to a user's resume (including nearby/location-based jobs) using an open-source AI API for scalable matching, and can automatically apply while allowing users to edit their resume and cover letter.
architectural_notes: Use an open-source AI API for job/resume semantic matching and ranking.

existing_features.title: Implement authenticated per-user data storage for resume text, cover letter text, and user-specified location (city/region + optional radius) so the app can persist and reload a user’s job-search materials across sessions.

Add a job intake feature that lets a user create job entries with at least: title, company, location text, job description, and an optional application URL/contact details, so the app has job descriptions to match against the user’s resume.

Implement a deterministic matching/scoring system that compares each saved job description to the user’s saved resume and produces a match score plus a short list of matched keywords/phrases used to justify the score.

Add location filtering based on the user’s manually entered location and the job’s location text, supporting at minimum: (a) show only jobs whose location text contains the user’s location string, and (b) show all jobs when location filter is disabled.

Create an application workflow per job that can generate an application draft containing: resume text, cover letter text (editable), and a submission checklist; support marking a job as 'Applied' and storing application history/status per job.

If a job has an application URL, provide a 'Go to Application' action that opens the URL in a new tab, and record that the user initiated the application from the app; do not attempt to automate third-party form submission without explicit user-provided API endpoints.
Choose and apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a productivity/job-tracking app, and enforce it consistently across all pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Match job descriptions to user's resume, including location/nearby filtering
Allow user to edit resume and cover letter before applying
Integrate an open-source AI API for scalable/limitless matching

projectName: Job-to-resume matching and application workflow app (manual location + editable resume/cover letter)
